description: SUBSCRIBE FOR A COOKIE! New MrBeast or MrBeast Gaming video every single Saturday at noon eastern time! Accomplishments: - Raised $20,000,000 To Plant 20,000,000 Trees - Removed 30,000,000 pounds of trash from the ocean - Helped 2,000 people walk again - Helped 1,000 blind people see - Helped 1,000 deaf people hear - Built wells in Africa - Built and gave away 100 houses - Adopted every dog in a shelter (twice) - Given millions to charity - Started my own snack company Feastables - Started my own software company Viewstats - Started Lunchly, a tasty, better-for-you lunch option - Gave away a private island (twice) - Gave away 1 million meals - I counted to 100k - Ran a marathon in the world's largest shoes - Survived 50 hours in Antarctica - Recreated Squid Game in real life - Created the largest competition show with 1000 people (Beast Games) - Gave $5,000,000 to one person - Passed T-Series to become most subscribed YouTube channel 🥹 you get it, I appreciate all of you so much :)
